description: This file defines a 'Results' component for a Lightning.js-based quiz application frontend. It includes UI layout, state management, and input handling for displaying quiz results and restart options.

classes.name: Results
classes.description: A Lightning.js component representing the results page, including score display and navigation controls.

methods.name: scoreText
methods.description: Computed property to generate the display string for the user's score.

methods.name: ready
methods.description: Lifecycle hook that initializes the component state by parsing URL query parameters and resets the quiz score in local storage.

methods.name: up
methods.description: Input handler to focus the restart button when the Up key is pressed.

methods.name: down
methods.description: Input handler to focus the restart button when the Down key is pressed.

methods.name: enter
methods.description: Input handler that navigates to the quiz page when Enter is pressed.

methods.name: back
methods.description: Input handler that navigates to the home page when back action is triggered.
